page.title: 13Art and Craft in Malhamdale
page.content: The block houses many people of artistic and creative talent.In Airton alone there is a blacksmith's forge,an artist's studio used principally for etching and painting,and an artist who has given up his job in favour of painting the Dales.In both Airton and Kirkby Malham,spinning wool is a thriving cottage industry,and in Kirkby Malham an active flower-arranging group keeps the church beautifully decorated. In Calton jewellery is made,and a World-famous sculptress,Judith Bluck,lives in Hanlith.
